text: does anyone know the origination URL for CRM Cards? I'm getting constant CORS errors trying to call a serverless function hosted on HubSpot :clown_face:

Answer from <http://chatspot.ai|chatspot.ai> "The origination URL for CRM Cards in HubSpot is typically the domain of your HubSpot account. For example, if your HubSpot account is "example", the origination URL for CRM Cards would be "<https://example.HubSpot.com>".

Regarding the CORS errors you are experiencing, it is important to ensure that your serverless function is properly configured to handle CORS requests. You may need to add the necessary headers to your serverless function's response to allow cross-origin requests from your HubSpot account domain."
....can you not perform Fetch requests in a CRM Card?
